cards.name: Stairs to Infinity
cards.text:
Players have no maximum hand size.
Whenever you roll the planar die, draw a card.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, reveal the top card of your planar deck. You may put it on the bottom of your planar deck.

cards.name: Armored Griffin
cards.text: Flying, vigilance
cards.flavor: When an order for griffin barding comes in, blacksmiths prepare their forges for months of exacting work. They know griffins always detect imperfections and never haggle.

cards.name: Chaotic Aether
cards.text: When you encounter Chaotic Aether, each blank roll of the planar die is a CHAOS roll until a player planeswalks away from a plane. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

cards.name: Auramancer
cards.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

cards.name: Interplanar Tunnel
cards.text: When you encounter Interplanar Tunnel, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal five plane cards. Put a plane card from among them on top of your planar deck, then put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom in a random order. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

cards.name: Auratouched Mage
cards.text: When Auratouched Mage enters the battlefield, search your library for an Aura card that could enchant it. If Auratouched Mage is still on the battlefield, put that Aura card onto the battlefield attached to it. Otherwise, reveal the Aura card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

cards.name: Morphic Tide
cards.text: When you encounter Morphic Tide, each player shuffles all permanents they own into their library, then reveals that many cards from the top of their library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, land, and planeswalker cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of their library in any order. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

cards.name: Cage of Hands
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
{1}{W}: Return Cage of Hands to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Mutual Epiphany
cards.text: When you encounter Mutual Epiphany, each player draws four cards. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

cards.name: Celestial Ancient
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
cards.flavor:
"We thought the clouds had moved from the night sky. Then the night sky moved, and the horizon grew wings."
-Josuri

cards.name: Planewide Disaster
cards.text: When you encounter Planewide Disaster, destroy all creatures. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

cards.name: Felidar Umbra
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has lifelink.
{1}{W}: Attach Felidar Umbra to target creature you control.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

cards.name: Reality Shaping
cards.text: When you encounter Reality Shaping, starting with you, each player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

cards.name: Ghostly Prison
cards.text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
cards.flavor:
"May the memory of our fallen heroes ensnare the violent hearts of lesser men."
-Great Threshold of Monserkat inscription

cards.name: Spatial Merging
cards.text: When you encounter Spatial Merging, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal two plane cards. Simultaneously planeswalk to both of them. Put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your planar deck in any order.

cards.name: Hyena Umbra
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

cards.name: Time Distortion
cards.text: When you encounter Time Distortion, reverse the game's turn order. (For example, if play had proceeded clockwise around the table, it now goes counterclockwise. Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

cards.name: Akoum
cards.text:
Players may cast enchantment spells as though they had flash.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, destroy target creature that isn't enchanted.

cards.name: Kor Spiritdancer
cards.text:
Kor Spiritdancer gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.
Whenever you cast an Aura spell, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: She reaches beyond the physical realm, touching the ideals from which all creatures draw their power.

cards.name: Aretopolis
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Aretopolis or at the beginning of your upkeep, put a scroll counter on Aretopolis, then you gain life equal to the number of scroll counters on it.
When Aretopolis has ten or more scroll counters on it, planeswalk.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put a scroll counter on Aretopolis, then draw cards equal to the number of scroll counters on it.

cards.name: Mammoth Umbra
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has vigilance.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

cards.name: Astral Arena
cards.text:
No more than one creature can attack each combat.
No more than one creature can block each combat.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, Astral Arena deals 2 damage to each creature.

cards.name: Sigil of the Empty Throne
cards.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: When Asha left Bant, she ensured that the world would have protection and order in her absence.

cards.name: Bloodhill Bastion
cards.text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, it gains double strike and haste until end of turn.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, exile target nontoken creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Spirit Mantle
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from creatures.
cards.flavor: The shield of unimpeachable purity is as strong as any wrought on the anvil.

cards.name: Edge of Malacol
cards.text:
If a creature you control would untap during your untap step, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, untap each creature you control.

cards.name: Three Dreams
cards.text: Search your library for up to three Aura cards with different names, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor:
"Choose one to heal, one to harm, and one to grant you the prudence to use them."
-Miotri, auratouched mage

cards.name: Augury Owl
cards.text:
Flying
When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Furnace Layer
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Furnace Layer or at the beginning of your upkeep, select target player at random. That player discards a card. If that player discards a land card this way, they lose 3 life.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may destroy target nonland permanent.

cards.name: Cancel
cards.text: Counter target spell.
cards.flavor: "What you are attempting is not against the law. It is, however, extremely foolish."

cards.name: Gavony
cards.text:
All creatures have vigilance.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Concentrate
cards.text: Draw three cards.
cards.flavor: "The treasure in my mind is greater than any worldly glory."

cards.name: Glen Elendra
cards.text:
At end of combat, you may exchange control of target creature you control that dealt combat damage to a player this combat and target creature that player controls.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, gain control of target creature you own.

cards.name: Grand Ossuary
cards.text:
Whenever a creature dies, its controller distributes a number of +1/+1 counters equal to its power among any number of target creatures they control.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, each player exiles all creatures they control and creates X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is the total power of the creatures they exiled this way. Then planeswalk.

cards.name: Guard Gomazoa
cards.text:
Defender, flying
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Guard Gomazoa.
cards.flavor: It lingers near the outposts of the Makindi Trenches, inadvertently granting another layer of defense.

cards.name: Grove of the Dreampods
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Grove of the Dreampods or at the beginning of your upkeep, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Higure, the Still Wind
cards.text:
Ninjutsu {2}{U}{U} ({2}{U}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Higure, the Still Wind deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a Ninja card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{2}: Target Ninja creature can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Hedron Fields of Agadeem
cards.text:
Creatures with power 7 or greater can't attack or block.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, create a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature token with annihilator 1. (Whenever it attacks, defending player sacrifices a permanent.)

foreignPrintings.name: アガディームの面晶体原

cards.name: Illusory Angel
cards.text:
Cast this spell only if you've cast another spell this turn.
Flying
cards.flavor:
"Yes, she is made of pure belief-but I hardly see why that makes her unique."
-Reith, master illusionist

cards.name: Jund
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a black, red, or green creature spell, it gains devour 5. (As the creature enters the battlefield, its controller may sacrifice any number of creatures. The creature enters the battlefield with five times that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

cards.name: Mistblade Shinobi
cards.text:
Ninjutsu {U} ({U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Mistblade Shinobi deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Kessig
cards.text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by non-Werewolf creatures.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, each creature you control gets +2/+2, gains trample, and becomes a Werewolf in addition to its other types until end of turn.

cards.name: Ninja of the Deep Hours
cards.text:
Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Ninja of the Deep Hours deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Kharasha Foothills
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control attacks a player, for each other opponent, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature, tapped and attacking that opponent. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. If you do, Kharasha Foothills deals that much damage to target creature.

cards.name: Peregrine Drake
cards.text:
Flying
When Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands.
cards.flavor: That the Tolarian mists parted for the drakes was warning enough to stay away.

cards.name: Kilnspire District
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Kilnspire District or at the beginning of your precombat main phase, put a charge counter on Kilnspire District, then add {R} for each charge counter on it.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may pay {X}. If you do, Kilnspire District deals X damage to any target.

foreignPrintings.name: Distrito del Chapitel de la Fragua

cards.name: Primal Plasma
cards.text: As Primal Plasma enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 creature, a 2/2 creature with flying, or a 1/6 creature with defender.
cards.flavor: Tocasia brushed the gears and cogs from the table. There, before two wide-eyed brothers, she began a lesson on raw elemental magic.

cards.name: Lair of the Ashen Idol
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. If you can't, planeswalk.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, any number of target players each create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.name: Sakashima's Student
cards.text:
Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
You may have Sakashima's Student enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's a Ninja in addition to its other creature types.

cards.name: Mount Keralia
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, put a pressure counter on Mount Keralia.
When you planeswalk away from Mount Keralia, it deals damage equal to the number of pressure counters on it to each creature and each planeswalker.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, prevent all damage that planes named Mount Keralia would deal this game to permanents you control.

cards.name: See Beyond
cards.text: Draw two cards, then shuffle a card from your hand into your library.
cards.flavor: Ancient lore locked in a mind driven mad is just as safe as when it was locked deep underground.

cards.name: Nephalia
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, mill seven cards. Then return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Sunken Hope
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"I don't concern myself with my enemy's hopes. Hopes follow the tides. They will retreat soon enough."
-Ambassador Laquatus

cards.name: Norn's Dominion
cards.text:
When you planeswalk away from Norn's Dominion, destroy each nonland permanent without a fate counter on it, then remove all fate counters from all permanents.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may put a fate counter on target permanent.

cards.name: Walker of Secret Ways
cards.text:
Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Walker of Secret Ways deals combat damage to a player, look at that player's hand.
{1}{U}: Return target Ninja you control to its owner's hand. Activate only during your turn.

foreignPrintings.name: Colei Che Va per Vie Segrete

cards.name: Onakke Catacomb
cards.text:
All creatures are black and have deathtouch.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Wall of Frost
cards.text:
Defender
Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
cards.flavor:
"I welcome it. The pasture is cleared of weeds and the wolves are frozen solid."
-Lumi, goatherd

cards.name: Orochi Colony
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Whirlpool Warrior
cards.text:
When Whirlpool Warrior enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
{R}, Sacrifice Whirlpool Warrior: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.

cards.name: Assassinate
cards.text: Destroy target tapped creature.
cards.flavor:
"This is how wars are won-not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed."
-Yurin, royal assassin

cards.name: Orzhova
cards.text:
When you planeswalk away from Orzhova, each player returns all creature cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, for each opponent, exile up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard.

cards.name: Cadaver Imp
cards.text:
Flying
When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

cards.name: Prahv
cards.text:
If you cast a spell this turn, you can't attack with creatures.
If you attacked with creatures this turn, you can't cast spells.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you gain life equal to the number of cards in your hand.

cards.name: Dark Hatchling
cards.text:
Flying
When Dark Hatchling enters the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Quicksilver Sea
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Quicksilver Sea or at the beginning of your upkeep, scry 4. (Look at the top four cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, reveal the top card of your library. You may play it without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Ink-Eyes, Servant of Oni
cards.text:
Ninjutsu {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Ink-Eyes, Servant of Oni deals combat damage to a player, you may put target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Ink-Eyes.

foreignPrintings.name: Ojos de tinta, sierva de oni
Occhi di Pece, Serva di Oni

cards.name: Selesnya Loft Gardens
cards.text:
If an effect would create one or more tokens, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, until end of turn, whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

cards.name: Liliana's Specter
cards.text:
Flying
When Liliana's Specter enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
cards.flavor:
"The finest minions know what I need without me ever saying a thing."
-Liliana Vess

cards.name: Stensia
cards.text:
Whenever a creature deals damage to one or more players for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, each creature you control gains "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker" until end of turn.

cards.name: Okiba-Gang Shinobi
cards.text:
Ninjutsu {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Okiba-Gang Shinobi deals combat damage to a player, that player discards two cards.

cards.name: Takenuma
cards.text:
Whenever a creature leaves the battlefield, its controller draws a card.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, return target creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Skullsnatcher
cards.text:
Ninjutsu {B} ({B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Skullsnatcher deals combat damage to a player, exile up to two target cards from that player's graveyard.

cards.name: Talon Gates
cards.text:
Any time you could cast a sorcery, you may exile a nonland card from your hand with X time counters on it, where X is its mana value. If the exiled card doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, they remove a time counter. When the last is removed, the player casts it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, remove two time counters from each suspended card you own.

cards.name: Throat Slitter
cards.text:
Ninjutsu {2}{B} ({2}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Throat Slitter deals combat damage to a player, destroy target nonblack creature that player controls.

cards.name: Trail of the Mage-Rings
cards.text:
Instant and sorcery spells have rebound. (The spell's controller exiles the spell as it resolves if they cast it from their hand. At the beginning of that player's next upkeep, they may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Tormented Soul
cards.text: Tormented Soul can't block and can't be blocked.
cards.flavor: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

cards.name: Truga Jungle
cards.text:
All lands have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Arc Trail
cards.text: Arc Trail deals 2 damage to any target and 1 damage to another target.
cards.flavor:
"Don't try to hit your enemies. Concentrate on the space between them, and fill the air with doom."
-Spear-Tribe teaching

cards.name: Windriddle Palaces
cards.text:
Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.
You may play lands and cast spells from the top of any player's library.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, each player mills a card.

cards.name: Beetleback Chief
cards.text: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
cards.flavor: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.

cards.name: The Zephyr Maze
cards.text:
Creatures with flying get +2/+0.
Creatures without flying get -2/-0.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Erratic Explosion
cards.text: Choose any target. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Erratic Explosion deals damage equal to that card's mana value to that permanent or player. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Fiery Conclusion
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

cards.name: Fiery Fall
cards.text:
Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.
Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
cards.flavor: Jund feasts on the unprepared.

cards.name: Fling
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
cards.flavor: About halfway to the target, Snukk vowed that he had been tricked for the last time.

cards.name: Hellion Eruption
cards.text: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then create that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens.
cards.flavor: Just when you thought you'd be safe, in the middle of an open field with no Eldrazi around for miles.

cards.name: Hissing Iguanar
cards.text: Whenever another creature dies, you may have Hissing Iguanar deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
cards.flavor: Viashino thrashes keep iguanars as hunting companions, giving them wounded captives as playthings.

cards.name: Mark of Mutiny
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: The flame of anger is hard to douse once lit.

cards.name: Mass Mutiny
cards.text: For each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature that player controls until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"What say you, my most trusted advisors? . . . Advisors?"
-Edra, merfolk sovereign

cards.name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
cards.text: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

cards.name: Preyseizer Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
Whenever Preyseizer Dragon attacks, it deals damage to any target equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Preyseizer Dragon.

cards.name: Rivals' Duel
cards.text: Choose two target creatures that share no creature types. Those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
cards.flavor: They could agree on one thing only: one of them must die.

foreignPrintings.name: ライバル同士の一騎打ち

cards.name: Thorn-Thrash Viashino
cards.text:
Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
{G}: Thorn-Thrash Viashino gains trample until end of turn.

foreignPrintings.name: Viashino de la azotada de espinas
茨団のヴィーアシーノ

cards.name: Thunder-Thrash Elder
cards.text: Devour 3 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with three times that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
cards.flavor: Viashino thrashes are led by elders who have survived countless challenges.

foreignPrintings.name: Anciano de la azotada del trueno

cards.name: Warstorm Surge
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.
cards.flavor: "Listen to the roar! Feel the thunder! The Immersturm shouts its approval with every bolt of lightning!"

cards.name: Aura Gnarlid
cards.text:
Creatures with power less than Aura Gnarlid's power can't block it.
Aura Gnarlid gets +1/+1 for each Aura on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Kill a gnarlid with your first blow, or it'll cheerfully show you how it's done.

cards.name: Awakening Zone
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
cards.flavor: The ground erupted in time with the hedron's thrum, a dirge of the last days.

cards.name: Beast Within
cards.text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
cards.flavor:
"Kill the weak so they can't drag the strong down to their level. This is true compassion."
-Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might

cards.name: Boar Umbra
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)
cards.flavor: "From in here, everything looks like dinner."

cards.name: Bramble Elemental
cards.text: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Bramble Elemental, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
cards.flavor: In abandoned corners of Ravnica, nature has begun to reclaim what it once owned.

cards.name: Brindle Shoat
cards.text: When Brindle Shoat dies, create a 3/3 green Boar creature token.
cards.flavor: Hunters lure the stripling boar into the open, hoping to trap greater prey.

cards.name: Brutalizer Exarch
cards.text:
When Brutalizer Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one -
• Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
• Put target noncreature permanent on the bottom of its owner's library.

cards.name: Cultivate
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

cards.name: Dowsing Shaman
cards.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: He combs the streets looking for the lost light, the discarded enigmas of the city.

foreignPrintings.name: 占い棒使いのシャーマン

cards.name: Dreampod Druid
cards.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if Dreampod Druid is enchanted, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
cards.flavor: "Don't mistake my creations for mere vegetation. They are my children, loyal and fierce."

cards.name: Gluttonous Slime
cards.text:
Flash
Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
cards.flavor: On Jund, everything eventually ends up in something else's stomach.

cards.name: Lumberknot
cards.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Lumberknot.

cards.name: Mitotic Slime
cards.text: When Mitotic Slime dies, create two 2/2 green Ooze creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, create two 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens."

cards.name: Mycoloth

Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

cards.name: Nest Invader
cards.text: When Nest Invader enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

cards.name: Nullmage Advocate

cards.name: Ondu Giant
cards.text: When Ondu Giant enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Maelstrom Wanderer

Creatures you control have haste.

cards.name: Noggle Ransacker
